content: I'd like to do a small project to get to know mathlib, and @Rob Lewis suggested that I could work on Fourier analysis. AFAICT this would require some basic facts about Bochner integrals (such as linearity, etc.), and single-variable derivatives would be nice too. Is anybody working on this?
@Kenny Lau Did you ever formalise anything in this direction?
You should ask @Jeremy Avigad and @Joe about the current status of integration.
It would be really nice to see some move in this direction.
@Gabriel Ebner Bochner integral is already defined in the library, though simple properties are not proved yet. But I think Iâ€™ll finish that very soon.
@Gabriel Ebner An option in the meanwhile is just to axiomatize or sorry the properties of integrals that you need. I trust Joe when he says he'll get to it soon.
